entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
